revisionDesc.change: additional proof reading and correx entry in order to fix many quote elements, notes, pre/post quotations
Fixed footnotes in the endnotes section. Renovation complete. Supra-validated. Supra reports that library is unknown, and we should find out what that is.
Continued renovation. Added PB, MILESTONES, and MW elements to endnotes. Need to add MILESTONE SIG values and printed signatures as well.
Major fixed. Need to add PBs and MILESTONES and MWs to the back matter, where the NOTES are.

Began moving NOTES in the body to the DIV TYPE=ENDNOTES in the back matter. Stopped at page 80. Need to add PB N= values to both the regular pages and the back matter pages (along with MILESTONES and MW).
Continued renovation. Need to add an extra DIV for "Notes to Studies By the Sea."

Continued renvation. Moved NOTES TO THE FABLES and ADDITIONAL NOTES TO THE FABLES to separate DIV TYPE=UNDETERMINED
in the BACK matter.
Continued renovation. Need to fix the 2 sets of Qs from p.56 onwards with ID,NEXT,PREV.
Continued renovation.Renditional default ALIGN(CENTER) for REF.
Continued renovation. Adding REF and QUOTE elements to all NOTES. MILESTONE SIG values also need to be fixed.
Began renovation.Changed EMPH to MCR, added renditional defaults.Need to put all NOTES into a DIV TYPE=ENDNOTE.Need to add NOTE ID,CORRESP, and TARGET values to all NOTES.
Validated to DTD version 1.1.23a except for header.
Macrodef imbedded. ".us" in title macro changed to ".bd". Proofreading changes made to electronic version.
This is 2nd version: footnotes moved to appropriate pages, $footnote imbedded, etc.; spell check run
This is adapted to run with the TAMU driver; different type faces, etc.

Still working on 1st printing- renamed; embed BCHYFOOT so that I can muck w/ footnotes and new :fnfn. tag, which will deal with Charolettes footnotes-on-footnotes; temporarily nuked the :rule. attributes, as I don't know what they mean, and code for them is not written.
put in end tags for stanza, poem, and line tags
Changed all :fn tags to :note tags. Used asterisk symbol for all of them, regardless of whether they turn out to be on the same page. This may need to be corrected later.
I changed all of the quote entities into tags and diversified :q. into :q. and :quote. or somethin'.
Inputted the title page of this document; it was not included before for some reason. There is also a pre-title-page page with an ornament which I did not encode.
Removed SCRIPT-specific PIs intended to handle nested NOTEs.
Converted Change Log to conform to TEI "revisionDesc".
Added "body" and "div type="advert"" tags as necessary.
